thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Saudi's Tasnee Updates on Cristal and Tronox Deal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Saudi's Tasnee Updates on Cristal and Tronox Deal
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - NATIONAL INDUSTRIALIZATION COMPANY :
* UPDATES ON UNIT CRISTAL ENTERING INTO CONDITIONED AGREEMENT TO SELL TO TRONOX ITS DOMESTIC AND INTERNATIONAL TITANIUM DIOXIDE BUSINESS
* SAYS PARTIES AGREED TO AMEND TRANSACTION AGREEMENT TO EXTEND END DATE FOR TRANSACTION FROM MAY 21 TO JUNE 30
* SAYS TRANSACTION AGREEMENT END DATE TO HAVE AUTOMATIC THREE-MONTH EXTENSIONS UNTIL MARCH 31 2019 Source text for Eikon:
